name: Gunwing
description:
Miz jam 1 entry.

Control your ship with the mouse. F3 to reset.

I overscoped somewhat and did most of the work on the final weekend before the deadline. Until then I had an absolute blast working on this. I went to bed very late on saturday and didn't sleep much This led to me to feel burned out by this project even though I only worked a little more than 24 hours on it in total. I entered the jam pretty late and that didn't help either. On the upside, I learned a ton about working with Godot. So there is that.

There are a bunch of things I would have liked to add, but right now I'm sick of it. Might come back to this after the jam when I have rested properly.
